languages.text: "Мне была оказана честь стать членом {g|Encyclopedia:Explorators}Эксплораторского{/g} флота Осознание. Когда Адептус Механикус призвали верующих для исследовательского похода в недра Простора Коронус, я примкнул ко флоту во исполнение священных обетов постижения".

traits.locale_text: "Мне была оказана честь стать членом {g|Encyclopedia:Explorators}Эксплорационного{/g} флота Осознание. Когда Адептус Механикус призвали верующих для исследовательского похода в недра Простора Коронус, я примкнул ко флоту во исполнение своих священных обетов постижения".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "I was honoured to become a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:Explorators}Explorator{/g} Cognisance Fleet. When the Adeptus Mechanicus summoned the faithful for an exploratory venture into the depths of the Koronus Expanse, I joined the Fleet in fulfilment of my sacred vows of comprehension."
languages.original_text: "Мне была оказана честь стать членом {g|Encyclopedia:Explorators}Эксплораторского{/g} флота Осознание. Когда Адептус Механикус призвали верующих для исследовательского похода в недра Простора Коронус, я примкнул ко флоту во исполнение священных обетов постижения".

traits.locale_text: "I was honored to become a member of Consciousness {g|Encyclopedia:Explorators}Exploratory{/g} Fleet. When Adeptus Mechanicus summoned the faithful for an exploratory venture into the depths of the Koronus Expanse, I joined the flotilla in fulfillment of my sacred vows of comprehension."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I was honored to become a member of Consciousness {g|Encyclopedia:Explorators}Exploratory{/g} Fleet. When Adeptus Mechanicus summoned the faithful for an exploratory venture into the depths of the Koronus Expanse, I joined the flotilla in fulfillment of my sacred vows of comprehension."

When the Adeptus Mechanicus summoned the faithful for an exploratory venture into the depths of the Koronus Expanse, I joined the fleet in fulfillment of my sacred vows of comprehension."

When the Adeptus Mechanicus summoned the faithful for an exploratory venture into the depths of the Koronus Expanse, I joined the fleet in fulfillment of my sacred vows of comprehension."

traits.locale_text: "I was honoured to become a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:Explorators}Explorator{/g} Cognisance Fleet. When the Adeptus Mechanicus summoned the faithful for an exploratory venture into the depths of the Koronus Expanse, I joined the Fleet in fulfilment of my sacred vows of comprehension."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Tuve el honor de convertirme en miembro de la Flota {g|Encyclopedia:Explorators}Exploradora{/g} Consciencia. Cuando el Adeptus Mechanicus reunió a los fieles para lanzar una partida de exploración al corazón de la Extensión de Koronus, me uní a la flota como dictaban mis sagrados votos de comprensión».
languages.original_text: "I was honoured to become a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:Explorators}Explorator{/g} Cognisance Fleet. When the Adeptus Mechanicus summoned the faithful for an exploratory venture into the depths of the Koronus Expanse, I joined the Fleet in fulfilment of my sacred vows of comprehension."

traits.locale_text: «Tuve el honor de convertirme en miembro de la Flota {g|Encyclopedia:Explorators}Exploradora{/g} Consciencia. Cuando el Adeptus Mechanicus reunió a los fieles para lanzar una partida de exploración al corazón de la Extensión de Koronus, me uní a la flota como dictaban mis sagrados votos de comprensión».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「自分には{g|Encyclopedia:Explorators}コグニサンス探索艦隊{/g}の船員になる名誉が与えられました。帝国技術局がコロヌス・エクスパンスの深部への探索のために信者たちを招集した際、自分は理解の神聖なる誓いを果たすために艦隊に参加したのです」
languages.original_text: "I was honoured to become a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:Explorators}Explorator{/g} Cognisance Fleet. When the Adeptus Mechanicus summoned the faithful for an exploratory venture into the depths of the Koronus Expanse, I joined the Fleet in fulfilment of my sacred vows of comprehension."

traits.locale_text: 「自分には{g|Encyclopedia:Explorators}コグニサンス探索艦隊{/g}の船員になる名誉が与えられました。帝国技術局がコロヌス・エクスパンスの深部への探索のために信者たちを招集した際、自分は理解の神聖なる誓いを果たすために艦隊に参加したのです」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “我很荣幸地成为了{g|Encyclopedia:Explorators}开拓者{/g}探索舰队中的一员。当机械修会召唤信徒探索科罗努斯扩区深处时，我加入了舰队，履行我神圣的理解誓言。”
languages.original_text: "I was honoured to become a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:Explorators}Explorator{/g} Cognisance Fleet. When the Adeptus Mechanicus summoned the faithful for an exploratory venture into the depths of the Koronus Expanse, I joined the Fleet in fulfilment of my sacred vows of comprehension."

traits.locale_text: “我很荣幸地成为了{g|Encyclopedia:Explorators}开拓者{/g}探索舰队中的一员。当机械修会召唤信徒探索科罗努斯扩区深处时，我加入了舰队，履行我神圣的理解誓言。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « J'ai reçu l'insigne honneur d'intégrer la Flotte {g|Encyclopedia:Explorators}Explorator{/g} de la Connaissance. Quand l'Adeptus Mechanicus a convoqué les fidèles pour s'aventurer dans les profondeurs des Étendues de Koronus, j'ai rejoint la flotte pour accomplir mes vœux sacrés de compréhension. »
languages.original_text: "I was honoured to become a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:Explorators}Explorator{/g} Cognisance Fleet. When the Adeptus Mechanicus summoned the faithful for an exploratory venture into the depths of the Koronus Expanse, I joined the Fleet in fulfilment of my sacred vows of comprehension."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai reçu l'insigne honneur d'intégrer la Flotte {g|Encyclopedia:Explorators}Explorator{/g} de la Connaissance. Quand l'Adeptus Mechanicus a convoqué les fidèles pour s'aventurer dans les profondeurs des Étendues de Koronus, j'ai rejoint la flotte pour accomplir mes vœux sacrés de compréhension. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Ich hatte die große Ehre, Mitglied der Erkenntnisflotte der {g|Encyclopedia:Explorators}Exploratoren{/g} zu werden. Als der Adeptus Mechanicus die Gläubigen zu einer exploratorischen Reise in die Tiefen der Koronus-Ausdehnung versammelt hat, habe ich mich der Flotte angeschlossen, um mein heiliges Gelübde des Begreifens zu erfüllen."
languages.original_text: "I was honoured to become a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:Explorators}Explorator{/g} Cognisance Fleet. When the Adeptus Mechanicus summoned the faithful for an exploratory venture into the depths of the Koronus Expanse, I joined the Fleet in fulfilment of my sacred vows of comprehension."

traits.locale_text: "Ich hatte die große Ehre, Mitglied der Erkenntnisflotte der {g|Encyclopedia:Explorators}Exploratoren{/g} zu werden. Als der Adeptus Mechanicus die Gläubigen zu einer exploratorischen Reise in die Tiefen der Koronus-Ausdehnung versammelt hat, habe ich mich der Flotte angeschlossen, um mein heiliges Gelübde des Begreifens zu erfüllen."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "I was honoured to become a member of the Explorator Cognisance Fleet. When the Adeptus Mechanicus summoned the faithful for an exploratory venture into the depths of the Koronus Expanse, I joined the Fleet in fulfilment of my sacred vows of comprehension."

languages.text: "Bana {g|Encyclopedia:Explorators}Keşiftör{/g} Malumat Filosu'nun bir mensubu olma onuru bahşedildi. Adeptus Mechanicus, Koronus Enginliği'nin derinliklerine keşif amaçlı bir yolculuk düzenleyeceğini söyleyip inançlı kimseleri bu yolculuğa dâhil olmaya çağırdığında, kendi kutsal idrak yeminlerimi gerçekleştirmek adına Filo'ya katıldım."
languages.original_text: "I was honoured to become a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:Explorators}Explorator{/g} Cognisance Fleet. When the Adeptus Mechanicus summoned the faithful for an exploratory venture into the depths of the Koronus Expanse, I joined the Fleet in fulfilment of my sacred vows of comprehension."

traits.locale_text: "Bana {g|Encyclopedia:Explorators}Keşiftör{/g} Malumat Filosu'nun bir üyesi olma onuru bahşedildi. Adeptus Mechanicus, Koronus Enginliği'nin derinliklerine keşif amaçlı bir yolculuk düzenleyeceğini söyleyip, inançlı kişileri bu yolculuğa katılmaya çağırdığında, kendi kutsal idrak yeminlerimi gerçekleştirmek adına Filo'ya katıldım."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
